programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.desc: The Undertaker's greatest fear is realized as his disappointing performance against Roman Reigns fuels the Dead Man to rebuild and redeem himself in a match against John Cena at WrestleMania 34.

programme.title: The R-Truth Game Show
programme.desc: Sasha Banks and Big E compete for surprise prizes and glory in ridiculous games like Fill in the Banks and The Big E's.

programme.title: The Comeback: Tegan Nox

programme.desc: Performers from WWE's new cruiserweight division showcase their abilities. Witness world-class talents perform breathtaking feats of athleticism.

programme.title: Total Bellas
programme.desc: Brie and Nicole's upcoming book and decision to reconnect with their estranged father opens up old wounds and starts a major conflict with their mother, Kathy.

programme.desc: Fresh off his stellar performance at WrestleMania 34 against John Cena, The Undertaker seeks closure on his 30-year career in a series of matches with the men he respects the most: Triple H, Shawn Michaels and Kane.

programme.title: Home Video Classics
programme.desc: Witness the most feared superstar of WWE in action in this Home Video Classic look at The Undertaker. There is no escape from the 'Man from the Dark Side' as he sends top opponents like Yokozuna, Kamala, Crush, Bam Bam Bigelow and more into the depths.

programme.title: WWE Story Time

programme.desc: Winter is here. The reality of the 'dark days' takes hold. Chris and Jessi struggle for each meal and need a new strategy. Putting the village first, Charlie falls behind on his own preparations. For Pat, it's time to find out if his gamble will pay off.

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: As the dark days descend, villagers scramble to make final preparations. Desperate for meat, the Morses come nose to nose with a bear. Stan makes a mad dash for his winter home on the Tozi. Charlie Wright answers an emergency call from a village elder.

programme.title: Ice Cold Gold
programme.desc: The miners are almost at season's end. With winter closing in and time running out, Josh and Eric arrive in Eqi for one last shot at gold. Meanwhile, the rest of the team focuses on dredging for rubies.

programme.title: Ice Cold Gold
programme.desc: It's the miner's last week, and Greenland has not only gotten in their heads but she is exposing their inner demons. With only days left before she covers her gifts up for the winter, The Beast reveals the chinks in their resolve.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and her staff scramble to coax a scared dog, hiding under a vehicle, to safety. Tania's in-laws are seeking a new addition to their home. Tia's son Moe and his fiancée Lizzy prepare for their wedding day.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When former adopters return to VRC to find their dog a companion, Tia and Lizzy switch up their usual adoption procedure to get the best results. Marcel rescues a dog abandoned at a local church and is concerned that some masses could be cancer.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: As VRC braces for Hurricane Barry, Tia and her crew ensure the animals' safety and Mariah and Earl tend to a stray Labradoodle that has been shot. Later, a cancer survivor hopes to rescue an unwanted dog she loves called East.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson works with a soft-spoken musician who feels abused by her cat and ashamed that she can't figure out how to stop it; a pair of hairless Donskoy cats who are treating their guardian, Debbi's, apartment like it's a 24-hour free-for-all party zone.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: The episode features the story of a violent cat, Sebastian, whose guardians have a newborn in jeopardy, a divorced man whose wild cat, Zeus, is threatening to leave him, and a 'my cat from heaven' story about a life-saving cat from Ohio.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson encounters Samantha, who fears her cat, Spike, so much she's been keeping him in a cat box outside her house. Also, Jackson makes his way to Brooklyn where a couple's relationship is suffering over the ongoing blood feud between their two cats.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson experiences his most vicious, and most illuminating, cat attack of not just the season, but in years, at the claws of a troubled cat named May. Also, the Cat Daddy must help a nervous-wreck of a cat guardian move her two very feral cats to Canada.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell

programme.title: My Cat From Hell

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens beef up patrols for the short pronghorn season. A deer needs to be captured and relocated from an industrial site, and an injured hawk is rushed to a rehabber. Near Port Aransas, Game Wardens check duck hunters on the bay.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Down on the Mexican border, Game Wardens pull in an illegal gill net. A group caught trespassing is found with firearms and narcotics. In East Texas, Game Wardens question a man suspected of illegally hunting on private property.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Nature lovers show up for Discover Wild New Hampshire Day. Officers conduct an undercover surveillance. Officer McKee rescues a starving owl from the side of the road. Later on, Mount Monadnock, a perilous rescue of an injured hiker.

programme.title: Welcome to Plathville
programme.desc: The nine flaxen-haired children in the Plath family have never had a soda, don't know who Spiderman or Tom Brady is and have never watched TV, living remotely in rural Georgia with their 'follow their own rules' parents Kim and Barry Plath.

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life
programme.desc: Whitney's love affair with Paris continues, but her relationship with Chase is on the rocks. And Ryan challenges Whitney to a brutal climb up the Eiffel Tower, but the biggest surprise of her life waits at the top.

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life
programme.desc: Now four months into their engagement, Whitney and Chase are no closer to living together, but wedding plans need to be made. During a mountain getaway, Whitney and Buddy test their new boundaries.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Actress Jean Smart uncovers the curious tale of an unconventional ancestor in colonial Massachusetts, who got her children entangled in her own thievery ring. Later, she faced execution when she was accused of witchcraft.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Megan Mullally delves into a shocking pattern of dysfunction in her father's line. She discovers that her two times great-grandmother defied societal norms to fight for her family's survival, all the while struggling to hang on to her own sanity.

programme.title: Hodges Half Dozen
programme.desc: Liz and Daniel try to potty train Rowan while keeping up with the needs of the quints. Daniel's brothers surprise Liz and Rowan with a playground for their backyard. As Connell struggles to gain weight, Liz and Daniel worry he may require a risky surgery.

programme.title: Hodges Half Dozen
programme.desc: The Hodges get ready for their first Halloween with their half dozen kids, including matching costumes for the quints. Later, Liz and Daniel are shocked to learn that Nolan, Connell, Liam and Dillon have medical conditions that may require surgeries.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Taylor brought her fiancé to help her find her dream gown. Brandi shops with her fiancé because she needs his approval.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Monisha has come looking for a dress for her three wedding ceremonies. Mary has a budget of thirty thousand dollars to buy two dresses.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Stefania wants a simple, classic gown, but her family has grander ideas. Precious just had weight loss surgery and needs a gown to fit her shrinking frame. Cheryl’s wedding is in 72 days and she needs a dress to fit her thick frame and tall height.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Dina is 50 and fabulous and is looking for a dress as sassy as she is. Laura wants a simple lace dress but is having trouble pleasing her young entourage. Shandel wants to look glamorous in a fitted dress but her daughter, Paige, doesn't agree.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Samantha brings her fiancé dress shopping against her mom's wishes. Kelsey asks her best friend to help her pick a wedding dress but their visions don't agree.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Legally blind bride Jessi argues with her overbearing mom about finding an age-appropriate dress. Passive bride Karen must make her voice heard above her opinionated pro-wrestler fiancé's. Bride Lindsay is exhausted after shopping with 13 bridesmaids.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: After an accident, Katie is determined to walk down the aisle in her dream dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Elizabeth hopes her fitting will be a lasting memory for her mom who is unable to attend her wedding.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: An apartment complex has not one, not two, but three extreme hoarders. For years their hoarding has gone unchecked but with building now under strict management, everything is about to change.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: As the lead singer of one of Canada's most famous rock bands, Kelly Jay has lived quite a life and he has collected a massive hoard to prove it.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Marine, Donny, has been to jail twice because of his hoard. Joyce sees comfort in her doll collection, but others see a creepy obsession.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: If they don't change their extreme hoarding, Jeff might lose the children he adores and Debbie may never have children at all.

programme.title: The Man With the 200 lb Tumor
programme.desc: In a remote region of Viet Nam, Hai has been bed-ridden for six years, weighed down by what is possibly the largest tumour in the world.

programme.title: My Legs Won't Stop Growing
programme.desc: Through the lives of three inspirational young women this documentary explores a number of conditions that cause the lower limbs to grow or swell excessively.

programme.title: Tallest Teens
programme.desc: Meet three of the tallest teenagers in America and learn how they fit into a society designed for people several feet shorter and how will their size impact their future.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Dr. Vincent tries to save a man's enormous toe, as Dr. Schaeffer has his hands full treating a little boy with big demands, and a man with incredibly long toes.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Charity weighs nearly 800 pounds. Suffering from flesh-eating bacteria and butterfly-shaped fat deposits, she is unable to function without help from her family. When bad news threatens her weight-loss journey, she must decide if she can continue.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At over 700 pounds, Teretha's life is confined to a bed, which is a far cry from her former job representing Detroit's healthy eating program. Her adoring family fears losing her, and hopes a gastric bypass is the solution she needs to save her life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: In order to keep pace with her daughter Charly's impressive weight loss, Charity must do something she's never done: find a way to go it alone. Try as she might, Teretha finds one too many obstacles in the way of continuing with Dr Nowzaradan's program.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?

programme.title: OutDaughtered
